title: 297A.96 LOCAL ADMISSIONS AND AMUSEMENT TAXES; EXEMPTION FOR NONPROFIT ORGANIZATIONS.
text: Amounts charged for admission to an event described in section 297A.70, subdivision 10, paragraph (a), are not subject to a tax imposed by a local unit of government or imposed on sales taking place in a single named local unit of government on sales of admissions or amusements, under a law other than a general sales tax law.
